headline: KKR & Co. Inc. Announces Time Change for its Conference Call to Discuss Third Quarter 2025 Results
summary: NEW YORK, October 24, 2025--KKR & Co. Inc. (NYSE: KKR) announced today that it has changed the time of its third quarter 2025 earnings conference call and webcast. The conference call will now be held on Friday, November 7, 2025 at 9:00 a.m. ET. The conference call was previously scheduled for 10 a.m. ET.

headline: Private Equity Had a Great Story. Investors May Be Tired of Hearing It.
summary: Despite the common moniker, much of the recent success has been built around a boom in private credit as opposed to equity. There are signs that the trend has entered its baroque period.

headline: My Biggest Investment Is Soaring: An Update On Patria Investments
summary: Patria Investments trades at a low valuation with strong yield, growth, and repricing potential driving 20%+ expected returns. Learn why PAX stock is a strong buy.

headline: Blackstone Q3: Distributable Earnings Up +48% (Rating Upgrade)
summary: Blackstone surpasses $1.2T AUM with strong Q3 earnings, rising fee-related earnings, and new retirement market opportunities. See why BX stock is upgraded to buy.

headline: KKR: Evaluating Valuation as Galaxy Container Solutions Launch Marks Next Step in Asset-Based Finance Growth
summary: KKR (NYSE:KKR) is drawing attention with the launch of Galaxy Container Solutions, a $500 million global marine container leasing and finance platform. This strategic move advances KKR’s asset-based finance ambitions and taps directly into global trade infrastructure demand. See our latest analysis for KKR. It has been a busy stretch for KKR, with the Galaxy Container Solutions launch coming soon after fresh minority stake deals in Asia and active deal talks in Japan and real estate. Despite...
